message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY

The paper deals with the application of deep learning techniques to detect fake news using only their text. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP) which is covered by cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the use of neural network architectures for this task suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with information retrieval and analysis, which could place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the potential danger of fake news to modern society suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
